ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Get the current user
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Get the current user
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Get details about the current user.
This endpoint can only be used with a [user-level API key](https://support.pagerduty.com/docs/using-the-api#section-generating-a-personal-rest-api-key) or a key generated through an OAuth flow. This will not work if the request is made with an account-level access token.
Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Get the current user

Get details about the current user. This endpoint can only be used with a [user-level API key](https://support.pagerduty.com/docs/using-the-api#section-generating-a-personal-rest-api-key) or a key generated through an OAuth flow. This will not work if the request is made with an account-level access token. Users are members of a PagerDuty account that have the ability to interact with Incidents and other data on the account. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#users)

Method: Get

OperationID: getCurrentUser

EndPoint:

/users/me
